mapper.select: select d.sidoName, d.gugunName, d.dongName, s.dongcode, count(id) as hit from searchinfo as s join dongcode as d using (dongcode) group by dongcode order by hit desc limit 3

select d.sidoName, d.gugunName, d.dongName, s.dongcode, count(s.id) as hit from searchinfo as s join user as u on s.id=u.id and u.gender = #{gender} join dongcode as d using (dongcode) group by dongcode order by hit desc limit 3
select dongCode, sidoName, gugunName, dongName from dongcode where dongName like concat('%',#{dongName},'%')
